isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINES, CUMMINS M11E AND N14E - OPERATION - Fuel Shutoff Valve (CUMMINS Component)

svcproc.title: Fuel Shutoff Valve (CUMMINS Component)
svcproc.para: A solenoid-controlled valve, mounted on the engine fuel pump, is controlled by the ECM. The valve opens when the vehicle key switch is turned on, allowing fuel to flow to the injectors, and closes when the key switch is turned off. The valve is also closed by the ECM if the engine speed goes above 2730 rpm. Power to the valve will resume when the engine speed drops to approximately 2120 rpm.
